meanings.definition: Of or relating to late summer or autumn.
meanings.sent1: The serotinal weather brought cool evenings and colorful leaves.
meanings.sent2: The serotinal flowers added a touch of beauty to the fading landscape.
meanings.sent3: The serotinal harvest festival was a delightful celebration of the changing seasons.
meanings.sent4: Her serotinal mood mirrored the peaceful transition from summer to fall.
meanings.sent5: The serotinal sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and gold.

meanings.definition: Happening or blooming in late summer or autumn.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed a serotinal picnic under the warm autumn sun.
meanings.sent2: The serotinal crops were ready for harvest in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The serotinal pumpkin patch was a popular spot for families to visit.
meanings.sent4: The serotinal butterflies danced among the fading flowers.
meanings.sent5: The serotinal apple orchard was a picturesque sight with ripe fruit hanging from the trees.
